analysis.description:
ScamStamp.markAsScam (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#166-181) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-theScamStampToken.transfer(scammer,numberOfTokens) (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#177)

ScamStamp.forgiveIt (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#183-201) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-theScamStampToken.transferBack(scammer,numberOfTokensToForgive) (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#196)

ScamStamp.forgiveThis (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#253-299) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-theScamStampToken.transferBack(scammer,numberOfTotalTokensToForgive) (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#292-294)

ScamStamp.forgiveThis has external calls inside a loop:
	- forgivedBy.transfer(forgivenessAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#268-269)

ScamStamp.forgiveThis has external calls inside a loop:
	- forgivedBy.transfer(toForgive) (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#277)

ScamStamp.contractFeePercentage should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#126-127)
ScamStamp.pricePerUnit should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#128)
ScamStamp.reliefRatio should be constant (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#131-133)
ScamStampToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#25-28) should be declared external
ScamStampToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#33-50) should be declared external
ScamStampToken.transferBack (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#50-72) should be declared external
ScamStamp.markAsScam (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#166-181) should be declared external
ScamStamp.forgiveIt (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#183-201) should be declared external
ScamStamp.forgiveMe (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#244-248) should be declared external
ScamStamp.forgiveMeOnBehalfOf (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol#251-253) should be declared external
ScamStamp.donate (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol) should be declared external
ScamStamp.fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x017a5d8d82afaa22bc29d75013d6ff3656e90851.sol) should be declared external
